# onDemandRules

**Instance Property**

An array of rules you use to determine which networks the relay uses.

## Declaration

```swift
var onDemandRules: [NEOnDemandRule]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If this value is `nil`, the associated relay always applies. If non-`nil`, the array describes the networks to which the relay applies.

## Accessing relay configuration properties

- **isEnabled**: A Boolean used to toggle the enabled state of the relay configuration.
- **relays**: An array of one or two relay server configurations. If multiple relays are configured, application traffic routes through both of them in the order they appear in the array.
- **matchDomains**: A list of domain strings used to determine which connections will use the relay configuration contained in this object.
- **excludedDomains**: A list of domain strings used to determine which connections won’t use the relay configuration contained in this object.
- **localizedDescription**: A string that contains the display name of the relay configuration.
- **NEOnDemandRule**: A base class shared by all VPN On Demand rules.
